publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-572 Donald Gorrie: Scottish Football Writers' Association-That the Parliament deeply regrets the decision of the Scottish Football Writers' Association to exclude women from membership of the association; further regrets their decision to exclude women as guests at their annual dinner, and calls on all football clubs and players in Scotland to put pressure on the association until it recognises that there is no place for gender discrimination in a 21st century Scotland.
S2M-572 Scottish Football Writers' Association (lodged on 7 November 2003) Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-572 Scottish Football Writers' Association (lodged on 7 November 2003) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Bill Butler*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Margaret Jamieson*, Ms Sandra White*, Robin Harper*, Mike Pringle*, Frances Curran*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Trish Godman*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-572 Scottish Football Writers' Association (lodged on 7 November 2003) Carolyn Leckie*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Helen Eadie*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-572 Scottish Football Writers' Association (lodged on 7 November 2003) Karen Gillon*, Alex Neil*, Dr Jean Turner*, Iain Smith*
S2M-572 Scottish Football Writers' Association (lodged on 7 November 2003) Michael McMahon*, Pauline McNeill*
